body:
It is expected. Tensors are merged with Variables in master. If you want to extract a scalar from a variable you can call `.item()` or `int(var)` to cast it explicitly.

Also @colesbury @gchanan, it would make sense to me if we started accepting scalar tensors as valid for `int` arguments. Do you have any objections/were already planning to do something like it?
